title: $3100 OPN SAT… Sunny 1br/Heart of H.V. lndry sto rm/office
posting_body: 152 Lily  between Gough and Octavia  ....in the HEART of HAYES VALLEY!!!!!!!!</bOPEN SAT 11:30-12:30
***..$3100 with dishwasher, garbage disposal,  stainless steel  appliances and granite counters.
It has been rearranged so that has room for large kitchen table.
Bathroom has a clawfoot tub  with new ceramic floors.
In the past it has been used as a 2 bedroom   Please call Jeff at
and he can set up a showing for you.
We can also send you a video text me at
A couple of blocks to the SHUTTLE!!
Extremely Quiet  on a muse street with very little traffic !!!!
Total tasteful remodel...... refinished wood floors!!!
A block from all the shops
Great public transportation to downtown and the peninsula.....Shuttle 2 blks....
THIS IS A RENT CONTROLLED APARTMENT!
Please be aware that buildings built after 1979 are exempt from rent control and the landlord can raise the rent to any amount after the initial lease.
NO PETS and NO SMOKING PLEASE
The great new Mexico City restaurant Cala now open one half block away, as is it's Taco Bar on Hickory!!
PLUS TOO MANY OTHER RESTAURANTS TO TYPE!!
Hayes St. has become one of the best shopping streets in the City with shops from; NEW YORK, PARIS AND
STOCKHOLM as well as many local one of a kind shops.
Bart and MUNI are only a couple of blocks away
The Freeway is only a few blocks to the South
A COUPLE BLOCKS TO THE SHUTTLES TO THE VALLEY
